name: kthxbye was already taken
tagline: One-liner cookbook / Random thoughts / Facepalm here and there
body:
### [1/1/2016] Find all files containing a given string // Encontrar todos los archivos que contienen un string dado

    `grep -nrw /path/to/directory -e "string"`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
